job description:
Job Description

-Experience in DataRobot for quick implementation of AI/Machine Learning .
-Experience in Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning,
-Predictive Analytics, Risk Modeling
-Experience in Big Data Analytics with the platform Cloudera Hadoop, HDFS, HIVE, CASSANDRA, MongoDB,

Python-Sentiment Analysis, Tableau, and Tibco Spotfire.
-Proficiency in SQL and PL/SQL

Job Requirements

+6 Years of Experience Total
Big Data, Hadoop, Hive, Python, Machine learning/AI/ML, HDFS
